name: Farm Frenzy (itch)
description:
Farm Frenzy is a multiplayer PvP game which can be played with 2-4 people either as a free-for-all (1v1v1v1) or in teams (2v2). In Farm Frenzy, players compete with one another by trying to see which player or team can capture the highest point total worth of animals.

Currently only KEYBOARD support (adding Controller input soon)!

Player 1 Controls -> Movement: WASD, Throw: E, Grab: F

Player 2 Controls -> Movement IJKL, Throw: P, Grab: O
